Create a mobile app that helps users track their luggage during travel, ensuring they never lose or misplace their bags again.
Develop a line of high-end suitcases designed to withstand rough handling and extreme weather conditions.
Launch a campaign promoting the benefits of investing in quality luggage, such as durability and style, to encourage consumers to upgrade their travel gear.
Partner with airlines to offer passengers exclusive deals on luggage purchases when booking flights through their app.
Create a virtual reality experience that allows users to design and customize their own suitcase, allowing them to choose from a variety of colors, patterns, and materials.
